Catherine Elizabeth "Kate" Pierson (born April 27, 1948) is an American vocalist, 
lyricist, and one of the lead singers and founding members of The B-52's. A multi-
instrumentalist, she plays guitar, bass and various keyboard instruments. In the B

the songs "Shiny Happy People", "Near Wild Heaven" and "Me in...
